## `SetHistogramIntervalDisplay`

Sets how bin (axis) labels are displayed on histograms.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetHistogramIntervalDisplay(IntervalDisplay display)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`IntervalDisplay`](#intervaldisplay) display | How to display bin (axis) labels. |
:::
